title: What is the use for Local Gaurdians during Hostel Admissions
content:
As in throughout the year, do they ever call the LG down at the hostels for any reason? 

If yes then, how frequently?

comments.body:
Hi

So local guardian(LG) is a point of contact for the hostel with someone in Bangalore.

They don't call LG randomly so don't worry about that...

They'll call LG only if there's something important or in case of some emergency!
The hostel authorities here are retarded af

How is that an answer to the question asked xD

But agree!
They don’t call them down. But you can go to their house on the weekend and you need their signature for that. They’re mainly here to represent your parents in case anything ever happens.
